resources.string: "Please pay particular attention to the usual hygiene rules."

"Meetings and events: Avoid visits and activities that involve gathering with large number of people indoors or with groups that are particularly at risk, such as the elderly, people with pre-existing conditions, and the immunocompromised."
"Working from home: If you are able to, work from home."
"Public transportation: Avoid public transportation as much as possible, particularly at peak times, and wear a face mask."
"If you have been infected unknowingly, hereâ€™s how you can reduce the risk of infecting others:"
"Additional information is available on our FAQ page on quarantine measures and voluntary self-quarantine."
"Additional information is available on our FAQ page on quarantine measures and voluntary self-quarantine."

"Be alert for typical symptoms. Even vaccinated people and those who have recovered can develop symptoms. If you feel sick or develop any symptoms, reduce your contacts with others, stay home, and contact your family doctor."
